entity.name: Laukik
entity.description: I'm a developer interested in building a scalable time-series database for cloud and on-premise deployments, with a focus on low-latency and low cost components. I have been working on this project for the past year. I have been looking for funding to support our ongoing development and maintenance costs as well as users to try this on production environments for feedback.

projects.name: Grid Scale Time Series Database
projects.description: This project aims to build a scalable time-series database for cloud and on-premise deployments, with a focus on low-latency and low cost components. The database is designed to handle high-throughput data streams and provide real-time analytics for monitoring and alerting systems. The project is currently in the alpha stage and is looking for funding to support ongoing development and maintenance costs.

channels.description: Will accept direct bank transfers. Please e-mail me for details.

plans.name: Hosting support
plans.description: This will cover the monthly cloud costs for the project testing in K8S.

plans.name: Developer compensation
plans.description: This will cover the cost of one developer working part-time on the projects.

history.description: Started accepting donations for the first time.
